PropertyList.name: Introduction: Dashboard
PropertyList.description:
Welcome to the follow me e-tron!
This tutorial walks you through the functions and details of the dashboard.

step.message: Welcome aboard the follow me e-tron!
Welcome to the driver's tutorial for the follow me e-tron!
You can enable switches at "Follow Me EV > Show Options" menu in the menubar.
The left switch is used for starting the indicator lights.
The right switch is used for starting the warning lights.
When the switch is facing up, the lights are started.
That button farther away on the dashboard is the starter. It starts the engine.
That button at the end of that shaft with a horn sign
Activates the horn when you click on it. Try it!
The left instrument is the speedometer. It tells you your speed.
You can check your speed by seeing where the needle is.
The right one is battery level. Make sure it isn't 0!
Also check the other two tutorials for centre console and keyboard.
